source_objects.description: Take your management skills to the next level with these course in negotiation, leadership, people management and more.
source_objects.title: Management

items.title: Bad Boss: Dealing with a Difficult Manager
items.headline: Be happy and successful at work with practical solutions for handling a bad boss or difficult manager
objectives_summary: Take back control over what your work week feels like - banish fear or unhappiness
Confront your boss in an effective, non-scary and professional manner to get win-win results
Create a positive work environment with a supportive and helpful manager

items.headline: Building teams and organizations that thrive during change and stay resilient under stress
objectives_summary: The ultimate guide to building high performance teams as an agile leader
Define agile leadership and assess your team's resilience
Express how heat within teams can lead to breakthrough and how to foster the right kind of heat as an agile leader

items.title: Resilience Leadership

visible_instructors.job_title: Resilience expert helping people thrive in adversity

visible_instructors.name: Beth

items.headline: How to ensure you and your team thrive in adversity
objectives_summary: Understand what resilience is and why it is essential in the workplace
Recognize characteristics of low resilience in your staff and team
Be a resilience role model

objectives_summary: #1 Best Selling Motivation Course on Udemy!​
Significantly increase the productivity and motivation of employees
Free 175 page downloadable copy of the book version of this course, which retails for $19.99 plus many free downloadable online resources

items.title: Customer | How to Build Customer Loyalty
items.headline: Understand which loyalty strategies work and how in your business.Relationships and loyalty play a big role
objectives_summary: Identify loyalty building strategies
Build customer loyalty in your own business
Move beyond transaction customer relationships

objectives_summary: Get a better performance from your employees
Create better alignment of employees personal and the organizational goals
Manage your team successfully and meet your objectives

items.title: Complete Health and Safety Auditor Course. OHSAS 18001.

objectives_summary: Have a great understanding of ALL the requirements of OHSAS 18001
Participate in an OHSAS 18001 audit
Offer consulting on OHSAS 18001 implementation

items.title: Product Management Fundamentals

visible_instructors.job_title: The Premier B-School for Product Leadership

visible_instructors.name: Institute of Product

items.headline: Case-based practical course on product management to build strong foundations in product concepts, process & frameworks
objectives_summary: A sound introduction to the world of Products
Understand value and the value management journey that is critical to the lifecycle of all products
Understand the Adaptive Productizing Process, a leading framework for product innovation

items.title: Be Approachable & Coach as a Manager
items.headline: You want to be the best leader. Gain the tools you need to encourage interactions and coach your team to the next level.
objectives_summary: Assess your current approachability
Increase your “approachability” quotient
Learn the coaching skills needed to develop your team

items.title: The Product Management for AI & Data Science Course 2021

visible_instructors.job_title: Creating opportunities for Business & Finance students

visible_instructors.title: Danielle Thé
visible_instructors.name: Danielle

items.headline: The Complete Course for Becoming a Successful Product Manager in the Field of AI & Data Science
objectives_summary: This course provides a complete overview for a product manager in the field of data science and AI
Learn how to be the bridge between business needs and technically oriented data science and AI personnel
Learn what is the role of a product manager and what is the difference between a product and a project manager

items.title: Delegation Mastery: Increase Productivity & Hit Your Goals!
items.headline: Time management & productivity boost using delegation to delegate tasks to teams & virtual assistants to hit your goals!
objectives_summary: Discover how delegation frees your time so you can focus on moving towards your most important goals.
Overcome common obstacles such as feeling that "If you want something done right you have to do it yourself."
Learn not only how delegation is great for you but also helps develop others and positively impacts the organization.

items.headline: And a look at risks, threats, business impact analysis, and more
objectives_summary: Know the differences between a business continuity plan and a disaster recovery plan
Understand what information goes into each document and how to obtain that information
Identify a risk or a threat

items.title: Growth Team Management - How to Build a Growth Team
items.headline: Growth isn't about growth hacking. Effective Growth leaders know it's about building, managing and leading a great team
objectives_summary: A framework for identifying and hiring a good growth person

Use proven communication techniques that ease tensions, open communication, and build relationships
